view

Class InputPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.InputPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class InputPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Manages the InputPanel and its components. Needed to type in the class values and show the data already typed in.
    Author:
    Jan Sauerland, Lukas Moser, Mathias Engmann.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
